Name: 藏梦 Hidden Dream
About the game: 'Hidden Dream' is a 3D adventure puzzle game, you will embark on a journey of Princess Wencheng, in this fantasy world, to find your home. In order to let every player can understand the gameplay, in the first episode, you will not feel too much difficulty, but as the journey advances, you will walk into the famous mountains and rivers in the west, and the difficulty will also be increased, as a puzzle game, at the beginning of the design, we hope to create a pure puzzle adventure game, in the level and puzzle design can give players different feelings and surprises, after the studio After three years of continuous collision and adjustment by all the partners, we finally combined the architectural structure and large puzzles into one design, and combined all kinds of elements, as well as the concept of light and space into it, so that each level is related to it, and a small operation of yours may help you in an unexpected way in the future ...... The game has a total of six episodes, each episode of the scene is the iconic location of Princess Wencheng on her way to Tibet, hoping that this will allow you to feel the unique scenery of China. The game scenes include elements such as fire, wind, water, light and shadow, which are both resistance to your progress and sometimes will become a help to your journey, helping you to solve the trials you encounter on your journey. 10% off the first week! Thank you all for your long wait and company! Welcome to join the official QQ group: 674309695 You can search '锈钻游戏' on WeChat to follow us and get more fun information.
